languages.text: Ториана Гапрак упустила момент, когда ее род, прежде слаженный и подобный настроенному механизму, стал рассыпаться на части, терзаемый распрями. Среди дальней родни многие винили Ториану в катастрофе Кьявы Гамма. Вскоре семейство Гапрак распалось на враждующие ветви и провело столетия в кровопролитной грызне, изредка прерываемой безуспешными попытками воссоединить род.

Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.
languages.original_text: Ториана Гапрак упустила момент, когда ее род, прежде слаженный и подобный настроенному механизму, стал рассыпаться на части, терзаемый распрями. Среди дальней родни многие винили Ториану в катастрофе Кьявы Гамма. Вскоре семейство Гапрак распалось на враждующие ветви и провело столетия в кровопролитной грызне, изредка прерываемой безуспешными попытками воссоединить род.

traits.locale_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, previously organised like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, harrowed by infighting. Among distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family broke apart into fighting branches and spent centuries in a violent struggle, that sometimes gave way to the futile attempts to reunite the house.

Among distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family broke apart into fighting branches and spent centuries in a violent struggle, that sometimes gave way to the futile attempts to reunite the house.

Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, previously organised like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, harrowed by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into combative factions and spent centuries locked in violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, previously organised like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, harrowed by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into combative factions and spent centuries locked in violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

languages.text: 托丽安娜·贾帕克错过了将家族成员团结在一起的机会。她的家族曾像运转良好的机器一样井井有条，如今却在内讧的折磨下分崩离析。许多远房亲戚将基亚瓦伽马星的灾难归咎于托丽安娜。很快，贾帕克家族分裂为多个派系，彼此争斗，深陷暴力冲突的泥潭中长达几百年之久。偶尔有人尝试将家族重新团结起来，但最终都是白费功夫。
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: 托丽安娜·贾帕克错过了将家族成员团结在一起的机会。她的家族曾像运转良好的机器一样井井有条，如今却在内讧的折磨下分崩离析。许多远房亲戚将基亚瓦伽马星的灾难归咎于托丽安娜。很快，贾帕克家族分裂为多个派系，彼此争斗，深陷暴力冲突的泥潭中长达几百年之久。偶尔有人尝试将家族重新团结起来，但最终都是白费功夫。

languages.text: Die Familie Gaprak war wie eine gut geölte Maschine organisiert gewesen, doch nun begann sie wegen bitterer interner Konflikte zu zerfallen. Toriana Gaprak verpasste diesen Augenblick. Viele ihrer entfernten Verwandten gaben Toriana die Schuld an der Katastrophe auf Kiava Gamma. Bald war die Familie Gaprak in verfeindete Fraktionen aufgespalten, die über Jahrhunderte hinweg eine brutale Fehde gegeneinander führten. Nur gelegentlich gab es vergebliche Bemühungen, das Haus wieder zu vereinen.
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: Die Familie Gaprak war wie eine gut geölte Maschine organisiert gewesen, doch nun begann sie wegen bitterer interner Konflikte zu zerfallen. Toriana Gaprak verpasste diesen Augenblick. Viele ihrer entfernten Verwandten gaben Toriana die Schuld an der Katastrophe auf Kiava Gamma. Bald war die Familie Gaprak in verfeindete Fraktionen aufgespalten, die über Jahrhunderte hinweg eine brutale Fehde gegeneinander führten. Nur gelegentlich gab es vergebliche Bemühungen, das Haus wieder zu vereinen.

languages.text: Toriana Gaprak ne vit pas sa famille, qui fonctionnait autrefois comme une machine parfaitement huilée, s'effondrer à cause d'incessantes guerres intestines. Bon nombre de ses parents éloignés tenaient Toriana pour responsable de la catastrophe de Kiava Gamma. Bientôt, la famille Gaprak éclata en factions adverses qui passèrent des siècles à s'affronter, n'interrompant leurs conflits qu'en de rares occasions pour tenter futilement de réunir la maison.
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: Toriana Gaprak ne vit pas sa famille, qui fonctionnait autrefois comme une machine parfaitement huilée, s'effondrer à cause d'incessantes guerres intestines. Bon nombre de ses parents éloignés tenaient Toriana pour responsable de la catastrophe de Kiava Gamma. Bientôt, la famille Gaprak éclata en diverses factions adverses qui passèrent des siècles à s'affronter, n'interrompant leurs conflits qu’en de rares occasions pour tenter futilement de réunir la maison.

languages.text: Toriana Gaprak se perdió el momento en el que su familia, que antes funcionaba como una máquina bien engrasada, empezó a desmoronarse a causa de las luchas internas. Entre sus parientes lejanos, muchos culpaban a Toriana por el desastre de Kiava Gamma. La familia Gaprak no tardó en dividirse en facciones enfrentadas y se pasó siglos envuelta en una lucha sangrienta que solo se detuvo durante los vanos intentos ocasionales de volver a unir a la casa.
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: Toriana Gaprak se perdió el momento en el que su familia, antes organizada como una máquina bien engrasada, empezó a desmoronarse a causa de las luchas internas. Entre sus parientes lejanos, muchos culpaban a Toriana por el desastre de Kiava Gamma. La familia Gaprak no tardó en dividirse en facciones enfrentadas y se pasó siglos envuelta en una lucha sangrienta que solo se detuvo durante los vanos intentos ocasionales de volver a unir a la casa.

languages.text: トリアーナ・ギャプラックは、それまでは完璧な機械のように機能していた家族が、内紛によってバラバラになり始めた瞬間を見逃した。彼女の遠い親戚の間では、キアヴァ・ガンマの惨事の責任をトリアーナになすりつける者が多かった。やがてギャプラック家は抗争的な派閥に分裂し、家を再結成しようとする無駄な試みを断続的に挟みながら、何世紀にもわたって激しい抗争に明け暮れた。
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: トリアーナ・ギャプラックは、それまでは完璧な機械のように組織化されていた家族が、内紛によってバラバラになり始めた瞬間を見逃した。彼女の遠い親戚の間では、キアヴァ・ガンマの惨事の責任をトリアーナになすりつける者が多かった。やがてギャプラック家は抗争的な派閥に分裂し、家を再結成しようとする無駄な試みを断続的に挟みながら、何世紀にもわたって激しい抗争に明け暮れた。

languages.text: Toriana Gaprak, bir zamanlar makine gibi tıkır tıkır işleyen ailesinin iç çekişmeler nedeniyle paramparça olduğunu fark edemedi. Birçok uzak akrabası, Kiava Gama felaketi yüzünden Toriana'yı suçladı. Gaprak ailesi, çok geçmeden birbiriyle savaşan fraksiyonlara ayrıldı. Yüzyıllar boyunca birbirlerinin kanlarını döktüler. Haneyi yeniden birleştirmeye nadire teşebbüs edildi, bunlar da çok cılız kaldı.
languages.original_text: Toriana Gaprak missed the moment when her family, which had previously functioned like a well-oiled machine, started to fall apart, racked by infighting. Among her distant relatives, many blamed Toriana for the Kiava Gamma disaster. Soon, the Gaprak family splintered into warring factions and spent centuries locked in a violent struggle only occasionally punctuated by futile attempts to reunite the house.

traits.locale_text: Toriana Gaprak, bir zamanlar makine gibi tıkır tıkır işleyen ailesinin iç çekişmeler nedeniyle paramparça olduğunu fark edemedi. Birçok uzak akrabası Kiava Gama felaketi nedeniyle Toriana'yı suçladı. Gaprak ailesi çok geçmeden birbiriyle savaşan fraksiyonlara ayrıldı ve yüzyıllar boyunca birbirlerinin kanlarını döktüler. Haneyi yeniden bir araya getirme teşebbüsleri çok nadirdi ve çok cılız kaldı.
